name: The Monk Who Hodl-ed His Punk
description:
Konark, India | Circa 2028

The religions of the world are increasingly becoming paler in the west while blockchains like ethereum, bitcoin, tezos, have divided people into different factions. While India finds itself in a spiritual crossroads too, the great wealth divide has shrunk significantly in the recent years and is growingly uniting large communities & sections of the society. A world where the relationship with money is constantly evolving, the wealthy are now found in the most unassuming places.

Such is the hope of #IndOnTheBlock.
